resetHealthPropertiesToDefault() - Method in class org.wso2.carbon.gateway.httploadbalancer.outbound.LBOutboundEndpoint
Call this method when unHealthy LBEndpoint becomes Healthy and also when when we receive a successful response from backend so that we can avoid any false alarms (i.e when unHealthy endpoint is incremented due to some timeOut but the actual endpoint is actually healthy).
